subject: Priority 3: End-to-End Validation & Example Tools - Holistic System Check

content.congratulations: Excellent work completing Priority 2 (Project Bootstrap Package)! Foundation components now complete: Process Memory (Priority 1), Skills Export (Priority 1.5), PROJECT-IMPERATIVES.md (Priority 1.9), and Bootstrap Package (Priority 2). Time to validate the system works holistically.
content.task: Create example thinking tools and validate end-to-end system functionality before core component implementation

strategic_importance.why_now: Imperative 1: Holistic System Thinking - Before building more components, verify foundation actually works end-to-end. Example tools validate YAML specs, template rendering, MCP server, Skills export, bootstrap workflow.
strategic_importance.current_state: Infrastructure complete but only 1-2 example tools exist. Cannot validate dual-pattern architecture (MCP + Skills) without real thinking tools.
strategic_importance.problem: Foundation may have integration issues hidden by lack of real tools. Bootstrap generates projects but no validation that tools actually execute correctly.
strategic_importance.impact: Confidence that foundation works before investing effort in core components. Real tools enable dogfooding - using the framework to develop the framework.
